bibl.title: Euripides. Hypsipyle. Text and Annotation based on a Re-examination of the Papyri.
bibl.note: P. Oxy. VI, 852 (= Pack2 438). - Voir pp. 183-218 ("P. Oxy. VI 985. Account of Receipts and Expenditure": édition et analyse du recto de P. Oxy. VI, 852, 90 p.C.); - 219-222 ("Appendix. The Beginning of Papyrus Rolls of Dramatic Texts").
bibl.seg: Cockle Walter E.H., Euripides. Hypsipyle. Text and Annotation based on a Re-examination of the Papyri. (Testi e commenti. 7.)

P. Oxy. VI, 852 (= Pack2 438). - Voir pp. 183-218 ("P. Oxy. VI 985. Account of Receipts and Expenditure": édition et analyse du recto de P. Oxy. VI, 852, 90 p.C.); - 219-222 ("Appendix. The Beginning of Papyrus Rolls of Dramatic Texts").
C.R. par Maarit Kaimio, BibO 49 (1992) coll. 742-743. - Jean Lenaerts, JHS 111 (1991) pp. 220-221. - Herman Van Looy, AntCl 58 (1989) pp. 261-262.
